折.definition: to break; to fracture; to snap; to suffer loss; to bend; to twist; to turn; to change direction; convinced; to convert into (currency); discount; rebate; tenth (in price); classifier for theatrical scenes; to fold; accounts book

折中.definition: to compromise; to take the middle road; a trade-off; eclectic

折兌.definition: to cash; to change gold or silver into money

折刀兒.definition: a clasp knife; a folding knife

折半.definition: to reduce by fifty percent; half-price

折合.definition: to convert into; to amount to; to be equivalent to

折回.definition: to turn back; to retrace one's steps

折壽.definition: to have one's life shortened (by excesses etc)

折子戲.definition: opera highlights performed as independent pieces

折射.definition: to refract; refraction; to reflect (in the figurative sense: to show the nature of)

折戟沉沙.definition: lit. broken halberds embedded in the sand (idiom); fig. reminder of a fierce battle; remnants of a disastrous defeat

折挫.definition: to frustrate; to inhibit; to make things difficult

折損.definition: to suffer losses; to lose (some of one's reputation, one's fleet, one's staff etc)

折斷.definition: to snap sth off; to break

折服.definition: to convince; to subdue; to be convinced; to be bowled over

折枝.definition: massage; snapped-off branch; sprig; to snap a twig (i.e. sth that requires very little effort)

折桂.definition: to win the laurels; to pass an imperial examination; to win a championship

折殺.definition: to not deserve (one's good fortune etc)

折煞.definition: variant of 折殺|折杀[zhe2 sha1]

折疊.definition: to fold; collapsible; folding (bicycle, antenna, bed etc)

折筆.definition: against the bristles (brush movement in painting)

折節讀書.definition: to start reading furiously, contrary to previous habit (idiom)

折籮.definition: mixed dish of the food left over from a banquet

折線.definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments); polygonal line; dog leg

折縫.definition: welt seam (doubled over and sewed again from topside)

折耗.definition: loss of goods; damage to goods; shrinkage

折耳根.definition: chameleon plant; fish mint (Houttuynia cordata), esp. its edible rhizome

折腰.definition: to bend at the waist; to bow; (fig.) to bow to; to submit

折衝樽俎.definition: lit. to stop the enemy at the banquet table; fig. to get the better of an enemy during diplomatic functions

折衷鸚鵡.definition: Eclectus roratus (red-green parrot of Papua-New Guinea)

折角.definition: to fold the corner of a page; to dog-ear

折跟頭.definition: to do a somersault; to turn head over heels

折騰.definition: to toss from side to side (e.g. sleeplessly); to repeat sth over and over again; to torment sb; to play crazy; to squander (time, money)
